ingredients.ingredient: 24 each Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
8 ounces thinly sliced deli roast beef, cut or torn into bite-size pieces
8 ounces sliced smoked mozzarella cheese, cut into 24 pieces
¼ cup thinly sliced red onion

cookingTips: Layer ingredients in order: pretzel, horseradish, beef, cheese, onion
Use room temperature cheese so it stays pliable and doesn't crack
Assemble just before serving to prevent pretzel from getting soggy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the textures and flavors in these bite-sized appetizers for maximum impact?
